code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuoteDetailPage=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[quote,setQuote]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchQuote=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:8080/quotes/".concat(id));setQuote(response.data);};fetchQuote();},[id]);if(!quote)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:quote.line}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:quote.actor}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:quote.movie}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:quote.tags.join(', ')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uC88B\uC544\uC694: ",quote.favoriteCount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:quote.image,alt:quote.movie})]});};export default QuoteDetailPage;
